attributes.action: ensure that large bottles of Vimto are readily available in all convenience stores in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vimto is in scarce supply in many areas of the United Kingdom. All Britons should have the opportunity to taste it's fruity goodness (in 2 litre bottle forms)!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
